title: GET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE
content:
0xB721981B2B939E070x680C90EE// GetPlayerInvincible
BOOL GET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE(Player player);Parameters:player: The player indexReturns: A boolean to tell if the player is invincible.This native will only return true if a player was made invincible with SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE.You should use GET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE_2 to get both SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE and SET_PLAYER_INVINCIBLE_KEEP_RAGDOLL_ENABLED invincibility state.
